mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status, m.ma_id, m.ma_name, m.ma_qty, o.order_vat,o.order_sum ,o.order_date, o.due_date, o.order_emp, o.order_qty, o.whs_id, m.unit_cost, o.in_date FROM material m, orders o WHERE m.ma_id = o.ma_id and o.order_status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_id, ma_id, order_qty, order_sum, order_vat, order_emp, order_date,due_date,in_date, whs_id) values (#{order_id}, #{ma_id}, #{order_qty}, #{order_sum},#{order_vat}, #{order_emp},#{order_date},#{due_date},#{in_date},#{whs_id})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status, m.ma_id, m.ma_name, m.ma_qty, o.order_vat,o.order_sum ,o.order_date, o.due_date, o.order_emp, o.order_qty, o.whs_id ,m.unit_cost,o.in_date FROM material m, orders o WHERE order_id = #{order_id} and o.order_status = 1 and m.ma_id = o.ma_id
mapper.update: update orders set order_id=#{order_id}, whs_id=#{whs_id}, order_qty=#{order_qty}, order_sum=#{order_sum}, order_vat=#{order_vat}, order_emp=#{order_emp}, order_date=#{order_date}, due_date=#{due_date}, in_date=#{in_date} where order_id = #{order_id}
mapper.delete: update orders SET order_status = 0 where order_id = #{order_id}
